DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single dose SBI-087 Japanese subject rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Doses Of SBI-087 In Japanese Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Must meet American College Rheumatology criterion rheumatoid arthritis functional class I III . Rheumatoid arthritis disease onset > 16 year age duration disease least 6 month . Men woman nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) , age 20 70 year , inclusive screen visit . Any significant health problem rheumatoid arthritis . Treatment great 10 mg prednisone per day . Therapy immunosuppressant within 6 month study day 1
